name: Judgement Day: The Board Game
description:
Judgement Day: The Board Game is a project made for LD41 based on the theme "Combine 2 Incompatible Genres".

In the game, you play as a space marine stranded in a base on Mars which was overrun by demons from another dimension. Fight your way out to uncover the truth.

The game is a mix between board-game and action. Combat uses card and a real-time system.
